text: Cyprinus is a genus of cyprinids in the order Cypriniformes. They are called the typical carps. The type species of the genus, the Eurasian carp, is also an invasive species. == Species == === Extant species === * Cyprinus acutidorsalis H. L. Chen & H. Q. Huang, 1977 * Cyprinus barbatus H. L. Chen & H. Q. Huang, 1977 * Cyprinus carpio Linnaeus, 1758 (Common carp) * Cyprinus chilia H. W. Wu, G. R. Yang, P. Q. Yue & H. J. Huang, 1963 * Cyprinus dai (V. H. Nguyễn & L. H. Doan, 1969) * Cyprinus daliensis H. L. Chen & H. Q. Huang, 1977 * Cyprinus exophthalmus Đ. Y. Mai, 1978 * Cyprinus fuxianensis Yang et al., 1977 * Cyprinus hieni T. T. Nguyen & A. T. Ho, 2003 * Cyprinus hyperdorsalis V. H. Nguyễn, 1991 * Cyprinus ilishaestomus H. L. Chen & H. Q. Huang, 1977 * Cyprinus intha Annandale, 1918 * Cyprinus longipectoralis H. L. Chen & H. Q. Huang, 1977 * Cyprinus longzhouensis Y. J. Yang & H. Q. Huang, 1977 * Cyprinus megalophthalmus H. W. Wu et al., 1963 * Cyprinus melanes (Đ. Y. Mai, 1978) * Cyprinus micristius Regan, 1906 * Cyprinus multitaeniatus Pellegrin & Chevey, 1936 * Cyprinus pellegrini T. L. Tchang, 1933 * Cyprinus qionghaiensis C. H. Liu, 1981 * Cyprinus quidatensis T. T. Nguyen, V. T. Le, T. B. Le & X. K. Nguyễn, 1999 * Cyprinus rubrofuscus Lacépède, 1803 (Amur carp) * Cyprinus yunnanensis T. L. Tchang, 1933 === Extinct species === * †Cyprinus yilongensis Yang et al., 1977 (Yilong Lake carp) == Image gallery == == Related pages == * Cyprinus carpio * Cyprinus intha == References == # Froese, Rainer and Pauly, Daniel, eds. (2017). Species of Cyprinus in FishBase. February 2017 version. # de Graaf, Martin; Megens, Hendrik-Jan; Samallo, Johannis & Sibbing, Ferdinand A. (2007): Evolutionary origin of Lake Tana's (Ethiopia) small Barbus species: indications of rapid ecological divergence and speciation. Animal Biology. 57(1): 39–48.
